data.text: @NIHAging @HHSGov I had a ton of sneezing with Omicron, as did many of my friends.

@NIHAging @HHSGov The vomiting & diarrhea can be tough to distinguish. It can be food poisoning, "stomach" flu which it's usually different than "regular" flu & flu shots usually don't help stomach flu or covid 19.

@NIHAging @HHSGov Been watching this Doctors videos throughout the pandemic. He prides himself on maintaining a balanced view. In this video hes clearly SHOCKED by the deception of our leaders as the #Pfizer docs show risk v benefit is clearly NOT there👇 #AdverseReactions
